about_the_game:
Welcome to Hotel 2025: Anomalies – a puzzle you won’t be able to put down.

Step into the hauntingly elegant corridors of Hotel 2025: Anomalies, where every room holds a story, and every corner hides a secret. This is no ordinary hotel. Strange occurrences, shifting objects, and inexplicable anomalies await your discovery. Can you uncover the truth behind the disturbances before the hotel swallows you whole?

6 Levels + 1 Secret Level

  • Hotel Hallway

  • Private Poolroom

  • Hotel Gallery

  • Waiting Rooms

  • Night Dining Room

  • Old 1925 Office

  • Secret Suite you have to find

What You'll Do:

  • Spot the Unseen: Identify anomalies—subtle and surreal changes that test your perception. From disappearing statues to unsettling shifts in decor, every detail matters.

  • Solve Intricate Puzzles: Engage with cleverly designed puzzles that challenge your logic and creativity as you piece together the mystery of the hotel.

  • Explore Unique Levels: Immerse yourself in 7 stunningly crafted environments, from a decadent art deco lobby to a surreal poolroom. Each level is a standalone story with its own atmosphere, challenges, and secrets.

  • Crack the Code: Hidden in each level is a piece of a greater puzzle. Collect the clues, assemble the code, and unlock the final mystery in the heart of the hotel.

Find all 280 Anomalies!

  • 40 Anomalies in each of the 7 Level

  • Some are easy to find

  • Others are a little tricky

  • Take your time to memorise everything

  • Levels are getting increasingly difficult

  • Be careful, or you could die

Each time you choose correctly, you move up one floor. Get it right 7 times to return to the lobby.

The Rules are Simple

  • Start at Level 0

  • By entering: Memorize every detail in the room

  • If you think, there is no anomaly: Go ahead

  • If you think, there is an anomaly: Go back into the start elevator

  • If your guess is right: You get on the next floor

  • If your guess is wrong: You start over at floor 0

  • If you die: You start over at floor 0

  • You have to be right 8 times

  • Then you unlock the next level

  • Leave the hotel

Why It’s Unique:

  • Immersive Art Deco Design: A surreal blend of elegance and unease, inspired by the glamour of 1920s architecture.

  • Chilling Atmosphere: Dynamic soundscapes, haunting visuals, and an ever-present feeling that you’re not alone.

  • Multiple Endings: Your choices determine how the story unfolds—will you uncover all the hotel’s secrets?

Find the Answers for 3 Big Questions

  • Where are the missing Persons?

  • What is the special effect of Luximinal?

  • How did the perfect murder happen?

Key Features

  • Single-player adventure with intense focus on observation.

  • Dynamic anomalies keep the experience fresh with every playthrough.

  • Steam Cloud saves to track your progress anywhere.

  • Achievements for mastering the mysteries of Hotel 2025.

Bonus: In the lobby, you will find a jukebox that plays more than 20 songs. Enjoy the music, click through and savor the atmosphere.

  • Jazz

  • Swing

  • Old (1925) and New (2025)

  • Background music

The hotel isn’t just alive—it’s watching. Will you rise to the challenge, or will the anomalies claim you?

short_description: Love spotting anomalies and exploring the glamorous Art Deco of 1925 New York? Dive into Hotel 2025: Anomalies – a captivating journey through surreal rooms where the ordinary turns extraordinary. Find hidden anomalies, uncover mysteries, and immerse yourself in a world of elegance and intrigue!
